channel.title: Cant port forward my VPS D:
channel.description: Ok i recently bought a VPS (myhosting.com) and when i run the source, it runs fine bought when the other people try to connect they cant, i made a new client with the vps ip already but they still cant, when i made a no-ip it fails the part where it checks for the server. What can i do? I have team viewer if anyone knows and i cant do it.

item.title: Cant port forward my VPS D:
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

The Web Guy:

You don’t need to port-forward VPS’ as all ports are already forwarded. However, with-in the firewall you’ll want to add an exception for port 43594–unless you’re using a different port–Or even disable firewall.

this…i just didnt wana explain XD

Read full topic
item.source: Cant port forward my VPS D:

item.title: Cant port forward my VPS D:
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

You don’t need to port-forward VPS’ as all ports are already forwarded. However, with-in the firewall you’ll want to add an exception for port 43594–unless you’re using a different port–Or even disable firewall.
